bibl.title: The Conversion of City Centres in Fifth-century Egypt. The Case of the Episcopal Complex at Hermopolis Magna.
bibl.note: The closing of the pagan sanctuaries, the donation of the building site in the heart of the city, the episcopal church complex built around AD 450 (basilica, bishop's residence, crypt).
bibl.seg: TÖRÖK László, The Conversion of City Centres in Fifth-century Egypt. The Case of the Episcopal Complex at Hermopolis Magna.
The closing of the pagan sanctuaries, the donation of the building site in the heart of the city, the episcopal church complex built around AD 450 (basilica, bishop's residence, crypt).
